about_the_game:
In 1960, the main character's life was turned upside down by the tragic death of her family at the Belhaven Hotel, and for thirty-eight years he has struggled with the dark secrets of his past. Now she is determined to go back to find out what happened in this cursed hotel and uncover the truth. But this hotel is not just an old building, it is a living hell, haunted by the horrific events of the past.

What awaits you in the game?

  • Story Driven Horror Experience: Connect the pieces of the past with an emotional and psychological story told from the main character's own mouth. ‘Even though I recognise the faces of my family, our memories haunt me. But I will never give up until I unravel the secrets of this hotel.’

  • Atmospheric Discovery: Explore the 1960s Belhaven Hotel, abandoned and ruined for years. Every corner, every corridor will lead you into unknown danger.

  • Puzzles and Clues: Uncover clues hidden in every room of the hotel, solve complex puzzles to unravel the mystery and delve deeper into the story.

  • Supernatural Dangers: The beings you will encounter are not just figments of your imagination. Shadowy figures, whispers and something that follows you. This hotel does not leave any of its visitors easily.

  • Psychological Thriller and Survival: The hotel will not only test you physically, but also mentally. Gather your courage to survive in this increasingly tense atmosphere.

Highlights:

  • Tense atmosphere and details that will give you goosebumps

  • Layered storytelling: Discover the hotel's dark past

  • Supernatural events that oscillate between reality and madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: The main character enters an abandoned hotel from the 1960s to solve the mystery of his parents' death. Facing dangers and solving puzzles, he must uncover the mystery and survive the hotel!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
